/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, acting as the main artery of the city, is flanked by towering buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by the radiant sun in the top right corner. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. On the left side of the street, patches of greenery peek through, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban environment. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
